page.title: 03PASTON TRAVELLERS SITE
page.content: My name is Fiancie Mason.I am a traveller.I am 9 years old.I live on Paston Site.The site is for travellers.The site is a big site and has only just been built.I live there all the year,now.We used to pull away for a couple of times, sometimes to go and see our cousins, and sometimes to go strawberry picking.On the new site we have a shed on there.The sheds have toilets and bathrooms in there.And a living room with a sink in.When I leave the big schools we will be travelling round the world again.I live in a trailer, like a big caravan, and we tow it around behind a van or a lorry.
